title: Dai Jia Jia
synopsis: "Once upon a time there was a planet, there was a dull town on the planet, and a dull home in the dull town..." This is the lively and interesting dull home series we recommend to children. The story takes place in the simple folk town of Duizhen, where there live such a family: Dad, Dad, Dabao, and puppy Dae Ben'er. Every day, there are whimsical ideas, clumsy cuteness, and fun. (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2012.This anime won The 26th China TV Golden Eagle Awards Excellent Animation
